original_text: Then he looked at those seated in a circle around him and said, “Here are my mother and my brothers!
korean_text: 둘러 앉은 자들을 보시며 이르시되 내 어머니와 내 동생들을 보라

sentences.original_text: Then he looked at those seated in a circle around him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 자기 주위에 원을 그려 앉은 사람들을 보았다

sentences.original_text: Here are my mother and my brothers!
